title: OLD CONCEPT: Cyber Goth Evelynn
body:
>https://imgur.com/cSKUi0O

I made this for last year's National Goth Day for a little appreciation for the dead Goth/Emo skin line. I never got around to finishing it, but would love to see the line revived one day {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Ah yeah, we only have a couple of Goth skins, right?  Annie, Amumu... is that really it?  I think Evelynn could be a good candidate for the line, if we ever brought it back!
There's one more, Orianna! If you guys ever do, I'd cry. I love goth takes on champions.
I don't want a Goth Evelynn skin unless it depicts her sacking Rome in 410 AD
